mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Happy Days are Here Again", "Pick Up your Corner", and "Keep It Neat" ROUND DANCES "Sidewalks of New York" and "Boston Two-Step" SPECIAL FEATURES "Just the Beginning (St. Louis)", "Two Callers from Canada", "Techniques of Calling" and "Asilomar Pictures, 1956". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Women on the Square - Feed-bag Fashions", "Style Series", "The Square Dance Picture", "The Square of the Month (Freddie Caswell)", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
